> I was talking about the use of carrier pigeons in times of war with 
some Japanese friends at the weekend and they said they thought 
these pigeons were used in the sengoku period. Does anyone on the 
board have confirmation of this or a historical reference? (A google 
search shows they were used by the ancient Egyptians and in WW1, but 
not much information on the intervening period.)

Thanks,

Gillian
